participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and family-oriented, enjoys cooking and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I enjoy long road trips and keeping my blood sugar in check. I like to ride horses. My car is a great place to enjoy my favorite barbecue recipes. I do yoga on Tuesdays. I am from Georgia.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, focuses on family and healthy eating.
participant_2.background: My children are my whole world, and I would love to find someone to share my love of Christmas with. I am going to use my creativity to come up with some exciting recipes for the vegetables I grew in my garden. I am well built and tall. My most difficult job was cutting down a large tree that had fallen on a power line. I sometimes drink too much wine when I go on wine tours.

content.text: What's up
I'm doing well, how are you?
Good, just getting ready for work
Oh that's cool. What do you do for work?
I'm a chef
Oh awesome! I love cooking. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making barbeque. I love the way the smoke and fire flavor the meat.
That sounds delicious. I bet your house smells amazing when you cook it.
It does! My wife loves it.
I can imagine. I love the smell of food cooking.
What are you doing today?
I'm going to be working on some recipes for the vegetables I grew in my garden.
Oh nice! What kind of vegetables do you have?
I have tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, and zucchini.
Those sound delicious. I love fresh vegetables.
Me too! I'm going to make a salad with them.
That sounds like a great idea. I love salad.
I'm glad. I'm excited to try some of my new recipes.
I'm sure they'll be great.
Thanks
